meanings.definition: The practice of living on the exterior of a host organism without being a parasite.
meanings.sent1: Epizoism involves living on the outside of another living thing without causing harm.
meanings.sent2: Some insects exhibit epizoism by residing on larger animals without harming them.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bugs practicing epizoism on the elephant's back threw a tiny party.
meanings.sent4: The concept of epizoism can be compared to a friendly neighbor who never enters your house.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a tiny village of creatures practicing epizoism on a giant turtle's shell.
